text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 266710000 (Drugs not taken/completed)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 410684002 (Drug therapy status)

name: SNOMEDCTDrugTherapyStatusCodes
title: SNOMED CT Drug Therapy Status codes
description: This value set includes some taken and not taken reason codes from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar
copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement
